```
[
  '(:action poke ; Poke an object using tools and update its status
    :parameters (?npc - person ?obj - object ?tool1 - tool ?tool2 - tool)
    :precondition (and (drained ?obj) (available ?tool1) (available ?tool2) (not (poked ?obj)))
    :effect (and (poked ?obj) (not (intact ?obj))))',
  '(:action drain
    :parameters (?npc - person ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?npc)
                    (at ?item1 ?loc)
                    (or (not (drained ?item1))
                        (and (full ?item1) (empty ?item2) (upside_down ?item1))
                        (and (screwdriver_inserted ?item2 ?item1) (coconut_eye_poked ?item1))))
    :effect (and 
              (drained ?item1)
              (or (full ?item2) (not (full ?item1)))))',
  '(:action break_resource
  :parameters (?npc - person ?resource - object ?tool - object ?wrap - object)
  :precondition (and
                    (wrapped ?resource ?wrap)
                    (not (broken ?resource))
                    (available ?npc))
  :effect (and
            (broken ?resource)
            (not (wrapped ?resource ?wrap))))',
  '(:action wrap
  :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?material - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (at ?agent kitchen)
                  (at ?item kitchen)
                  (at ?material kitchen)
                  (or (broken ?item) (hole_in_eye ?item) (hole_poked ?item) (coconut_has_eyes ?item))
                  (not (wrapped ?item)))
  :effect (and
            (wrapped ?item ?material)
            (not (unwrapped ?item))))',
  '(:action bore
    :parameters (?person - person ?tool1 - tool ?tool2 - tool ?target - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (tool_positioned ?tool1 ?target)
                    (not (target_modified ?target)))
    :effect (and
              (target_modified ?target)
              (tool_used ?tool1 ?target)))'
]
```
